brahmavAqdinO# vadanti hOtaqvya#M dIkShiqtasya# gRuqhA(3) i na hO#taqvyA(3)miti# haqvirvai dI$kShiqtO yajju#huqyAd-yaja#mAnasyAvaqdAya# juhuyAqd-yanna ju#huqyAd-ya#j~japaqruraqntari#yAqdyE dEqvA manO#jAtA manOqyujaq ityA#ha prAqNA 
vai dEqvA manO#jAtA manOqyujaqstEShvEqva paqrOkSha#M juhOtiq tannEva# huqtaM nEvAhu#ta(gg) svaqpantaqM ~Mvai dI$kShiqta(gm) rakShA(gm)#si jiGA(gm)santyaqgniH- [  ] 29
